meanings.definition: a device used to break down organic materials at high temperatures
meanings.sent1: The pyrolyzers efficiently converted the waste into useful products.
meanings.sent2: The company invested in new pyrolyzers to improve their recycling process.
meanings.sent3: The pyrolyzers were so hot, they could turn a banana peel into a diamond!
meanings.sent4: The old pyrolyzers groaned and hissed like dragons as they worked tirelessly.
meanings.sent5: The pyrolyzers roared to life, devouring the wood chips with fiery intensity.

meanings.definition: those who operate a pyrolyzing machine
meanings.sent1: The skilled pyrolyzers knew exactly how to control the temperature for optimal results.
meanings.sent2: The team of pyrolyzers worked in shifts to ensure continuous operation of the machine.
meanings.sent3: The pyrolyzers joked that they were like wizards, turning garbage into gold.
meanings.sent4: The pyrolyzers moved with precision and expertise, like conductors of a fiery orchestra.
meanings.sent5: The pyrolyzers were the unsung heroes of the recycling plant, working behind the scenes.
